nodes.text: Gonky was a GNK-series power droid. She was an unusually enthusiastic member of her series, and had a taste for combat situations.
Gonky joined the Smuggler's crew and participated in various missions.
Gonky was created by Kabam for Star Wars: Uprising, a canon video game for iOS and Android devices. The player could send the droid on various crew run missions to find and gather useful items.
